name: David Lopez
description: I am 6′ tall, 250 lbs, light brown hair and hazel / blue eyes. I have daughter 12 With out . I would have nothing or be nothing. I enjoy sharing adventures, family events and life with them. I am the only child of me parents with no siblings. I like to spend time with him hunting, working or just doing something crazy. I like to ride 4 wheelers, Go sand Railing, camping, fish & hunt, although I do not get to do it as Often as I would like. I Own a Construction Company of my Own. Some of the greates events in my life ( other then my Daughter) have been shared with other Men and Women durring critical life threatening times either at an accident or on the slopes of a mountain trying to rescue someone in need. I am a loving and caring person.
